snippet: A report released by the Organization of American States encouraged “flexibility” in how the drug war is carried out, including considering the legalization of marijuana.
abstract: Comprehensive report on drug policy in the Americas released by consortium Organization of American States suggests that legalization of marijuana, but not other illicit drugs, be considered among a range of ideas to reassess how the drug war is carried out.
lead_paragraph: A report released by the Organization of American States encouraged “flexibility” in how the drug war is carried out, including considering the legalization of marijuana.

headline.main: Americas Coalition Puts Marijuana Legalization Up for Discussion
headline.print_headline: Americas Coalition Suggests Marijuana Laws Be Relaxed
